TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 實作會傳回靜態欄位和屬性參考的標記延伸。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that returns static field and property references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是用於標記延伸實作`{x:Static}`.NET XAML 服務 XAML 語言功能的支援。This class is a markup extension implementation for `{x:Static}` in the .NET XAML services support of XAML language features. XAML 使用方式資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 您通常會使用靜態參考類型，包括從無法具現化在 XAML 中因為型別是靜態的類型從取得靜態的值。You typically use static references to obtain static values from types, including from types that cannot be instantiated in XAML because the type is static. 常見的案例的範例位置`{x:Static}`適合包含可以視為常數，例如固定的數學值或狀態的唯一索引鍵的值。Common examples of cases where `{x:Static}` is useful include values that can be thought of as constants, such as fixed math values or unique keys for states. 所參考的靜態成員沒有來自 XAML 結構描述內容與相關聯的特定架構組件。The static members being referenced do not have to come from specific framework assemblies associated with XAML schema context. 您可以將其他組件和 XAML 使用的 CLR 命名空間對應，然後可以參考中使用您所對應的前置詞的 XAML 類型的靜態成員。You can map other assemblies and CLR namespaces for XAML usage and then can refer to static members of types in XAML using the prefix you mapped.

span.span: x:Static Markup Extension

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string member) cil managed

param.name: member
param.span: 識別要參考之成員的字串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

param.span: 這個字串使用 prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName 格式。

span.span: This string uses the format prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName.

param.span: prefix 是 XAML 命名空間的對應前置詞，只有未對應至預設 XAML 命名空間的參考靜態值才需要。

span.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

summary.span: 使用提供的 字串，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `member`當您在設定時，不會評估值。The `member` value is not evaluated when you set it. 如果初始的值不是`null`，然後在可接受的值。If the initial value is not `null`,then the value is accepted. 實際的 「 剖析及評估`member`值會延遲，直到XAML 寫入器會處理擴充功能使用方式時，會呼叫。The actual parsing and evaluation of the `member` value is deferred until is called when a XAML writer processes an extension usage. 在的時間、 XAML 結構描述內容通知的類型對應與可以取得的值。At that time, XAML schema context informs the type mapping and the value can be obtained.

x:Static Markup Extension

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Member { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Member : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定成員名稱字串，這個成員名稱字串用來根據服務提供的類型解析程式以解析屬性的靜態欄位或屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a member name string that is used to resolve a static field or property based on the service-provided type resolver.

value.span: 識別要參考之成員的字串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串通常會使用格式*前置詞*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前置詞*是 XML 命名空間的對應前置詞，且只需要參考未對應至預設 XML 命名空間的靜態值)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). 字串也可以指定只有成員名稱，因此長度為也提供，但請注意，這項技術不支援 XML 命名空間和前置詞; 它型別系統層級運作。The string can also specify only the member name, so long as is also supplied, but note that this technique will not support XML namespaces and prefixes; it is working at the type system level. XAML 使用方式資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 當您設定; 它不會評估此值只要值不是`null`將會接受它。This value is not evaluated when you set it; so long as the value is not `null` it will be accepted. 實際剖析和數值的評估會延後到在剖析期間呼叫。The actual parsing and evaluation of the value is deferred until is called during parsing. 所使用的一般狀況下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 處理器，XAML 處理器的 CLR 型別傳遞型別解析程式，作為其服務合約的一部分，並用此解析程式上呼叫。Under the normal scenario of use by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor, the XAML processor passes a type resolver for CLR types as part of its service contract, and this resolver is used on the call.

summary.span: 取得或設定可定義要傳回之靜態成員的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that defines the static member to return.

value.span: 可定義要傳回之靜態成員的 。

span.span: The that defines the static member to return.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支援替代模式，因此它會傳回靜態成員，根據正在簡單成員名稱和提供做為其擁有者型別，而非提供完整的名稱，格式*型別*`.`*成員*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 型別解析程式仍會做，但在此情況下並基本上會結合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`. 請注意，這項技術不支援 XAML 命名空間和前置詞;它針對支援型別系統，而不是 XAML 類型系統中運作。Note that this technique will not support XAML namespaces and prefixes; it is working against the backing type system, not the XAML type system. 字串通常會使用格式*前置詞*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前置詞*是 XML 命名空間的對應前置詞，且只需要參考未對應至預設 XML 命名空間的靜態值)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). XAML 使用方式資訊，請參閱[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以為標記延伸提供服務的物件。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 服務提供者預設會提供可實作類型解析程式的服務 ()。

span.span: The service provider is expected to provide a service that implements a type resolver ().

summary.span: 傳回要在套用這個延伸的屬性上設定的物件值。

span.span: Returns an object value to set on the property where you apply this extension.

summary.span: 對於 ，傳回值是針對所要求靜態成員所評估的靜態值。

span.span: For , the return value is the static value that is evaluated for the requested static member.

returns.span: 要在套用延伸的屬性上設定的靜態值。

span.span: The static value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支援 XAML 語言功能，而且通常不適合直接呼叫。This method supports XAML language features and is generally not intended to be called directly. XAML 處理器實作會使用這個方法正確處理`x:Static`物件建立期間的延伸模組值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method to correctly handle the `x:Static` extension values during object creation. 這項實作依賴為基礎的服務上傳入`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. `serviceProvider` 不能`null`。`serviceProvider` must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`物件應該會傳回一項服務。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to return a service for . 預設 XAML 讀取器和 XAML 寫入器所使用的一般案例中，在適當的服務提供者使用。Under the normal scenario of use by the default XAML readers and XAML writers, a suitable service provider is available. 無效的 XAML 結構描述內容可能會有中斷類型對應的副作用，因此服務。An invalid XAML schema context might have the side effect of breaking type mapping and thus the service. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支援替代模式，因此它會傳回靜態成員，根據正在簡單成員名稱和提供做為其擁有者型別，而非提供完整的名稱，格式*型別*`.`*成員*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 型別解析程式仍會做，但在此情況下並基本上會結合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`.

exception.span: 評估時，延伸的 值是 。
